name: Cheese Soup with Broccoli
author: Aubra
summary: A great Cheese Soup recipe. It can be used as a light meal with salad, but we like it best with ham.
ingredients: 1 pound processed cheese food (eg. Velveeta), cubed
directions: In a large saucepan on medium high heat, saute the onions in the butter or margarine until tender
Add the flour and salt and pepper to taste
Add the milk slowly, until mixture is thick and bubbling
In a smaller saucepan, bring the chicken broth to a boil
Add the carrot, celery, and broccoli
Cook about 5 minutes, or until tender
Combine the broth mixture with the milk mixture and stir until fully blended
Allow soup to heat over medium heat until cheese is melted
Important: DO NOT let the soup boil because the cheese will separate and curdle the soup
